property.name: offer_key
property.value: Accept this quest to take responsibility of a random FriendZ. Move to an open area to allow a FriendZ to be summoned. Feed 100 meat to hire. There are 8 in total - Desert Eagle Tom, M60 Dave, AK47 Momma, Gutsy T.A. Rifle Soldier, SMG Arlene, Magnum Biker, Sniper Boe, and Auto Moe.

property.name: description_key
property.value: Move to an open area to allow a random FriendZ to be summoned.
